data_table.description: Ultrasound Imputed Values, Black Males, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LOPADA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, left common carotid: optimal angle [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: ROPADA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, right common carotid: optimal angle [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: LBIADA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, left bifurcation [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: RBIADA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, right bifurcation [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: LINADA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, left internal carotid [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: RINADA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, right internal carotid [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: LOPAWA45
variable.description: Weight for LOPADA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: ROPAWA45
variable.description: Weight for ROPADA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: LBIAWA45
variable.description: Weight for LBIADA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: RBIAWA45
variable.description: Weight for RBIADA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: LINAWA45
variable.description: Weight for LINADA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: RINAWA45
variable.description: Weight for RINADA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: RESPONS
variable.description: Number of observed sites [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: SUMWT45
variable.description: Number of observed values / 6 = weight for Sum45_1 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: SUM45_1
variable.description: Mean of the DA45 variables [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: SUM45_2
variable.description: Weighted mean of the DA45 variables [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: SUM45_3
variable.description: Z-score summary statistic for the DA45 variables [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: LATEREAD
variable.description: 1=scan date >=15May87, 0= scan date<15May87 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Ultrasound Imputed Values, black males, exam 1]
